Study part 3 Assessment Zn absorption intrinsically extrinsically label wheat : stable isotope absorption study woman childbearing age , men , consume test meal prepare either intrinsically label Zn biofortified wheat , regular wheat post-harvest fortify wheat extrinsically label immediately consumption .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Human Zinc Absorption From Wheat-based Meals
DOC.detailed_description: The overall goal study part 1 2 evaluate compare fractional absolute Zn absorption biofortified wheat cultivar ( 60 ppm Zn ) regular wheat ( 28 ppm Zn ) post harvest fortify wheat ( 60 ppm Zn ) total 3 test meal per study . The study conduct product base wheat high extraction rate ( study part 1 ) medium extraction rate ( study part 2 ) two separate group woman childbearing age . The goal study part 3 investigate difference absorption measurement intrinsically extrinsically label biofortified wheat . The label test meal nature fortificant ( extrinsic v intrinsic ) , total 3 test meal .
DOC.criteria: Female , 18 45 year old ( Study part 1 2 ) . Female male , 18 45 year old ( Study part 3 ) Body Mass Index range 18.5 25 kg/m2 Signed informed consent Any metabolic , gastrointestinal kidney chronic disease diabetes , anemia , hepatitis , hypertension , cancer cardiovascular disease ( accord subject statement ) Gluten intolerance , celiac disease Continuous/longterm use medication whole study ( except contraceptive ) Vegans Consumption mineral vitamin supplement within 2 week prior 1st test meal administration Smoking Pregnancy ( Urine pregnancy test shall perform test meal administration ) Lactating Earlier participation study use Zn stable isotope participation clinical study within last 30 day
